00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Feedback;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Feedback - Send mail to professors.
00023 
00024 =cut
00025 
00026 # *** feedback should be exempt from authentication, so that people can send
00027 # feedback from the login page!
00028 
00029 use strict;
00030 use warnings;
00031 use Data::Dumper;
00032 #use CGI qw(-nosticky );
00033 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00034 use Mail::Sender;
00035 use Socket qw/unpack_sockaddr_in inet_ntoa/; # for remote host/port info
00036 use Text::Wrap qw(wrap);
00037 use WeBWorK::Utils qw/ decodeAnswers/;
00038 
00039 use mod_perl;
00040 use constant MP2 => ( exists $ENV{MOD_PERL_API_VERSION} and $ENV{MOD_PERL_API_VERSION} >= 2 );
00041 
00042 # request paramaters used
00043 # 
00044 # user
00045 # key
00046 # module
00047 # set (if from ProblemSet or Problem)
00048 # problem (if from Problem)
00049 # displayMode (if from Problem)
00050 # showOldAnswers (if from Problem)
00051 # showCorrectAnswers (if from Problem)
00052 # showHints (if from Problem)
00053 # showSolutions (if from Problem)
00054 
00055 # state data sent
00056 # 
00057 # user object for current user
00058 # permission level of current user
00059 # current session key
00060 # which ContentGenerator module called Feedback?
00061 # set object for current set (if from ProblemSet or Problem)
00062 # problem object for current problem (if from Problem)
00063 # display options (if from Problem)
00064 
00065 sub body {
00066     my ($self) = @_;
00067     my $r = $self->r;
00068     my $ce = $r->ce;
00069     my $db = $r->db;
00070     my $authz = $r->authz;
00071     
00072     # get form fields 
00073     my $key                = $r->param("key");
00074     my $userName           = $r->param("user");
00075     my $module             = $r->param("module");
00076     my $setName            = $r->param("set");
00077     my $problemNumber      = $r->param("problem");
00078     my $displayMode        = $r->param("displayMode");
00079     my $showOldAnswers     = $r->param("showOldAnswers");
00080     my $showCorrectAnswers = $r->param("showCorrectAnswers");
00081     my $showHints          = $r->param("showHints");
00082     my $showSolutions      = $r->param("showSolutions");
00083     my $from               = $r->param("from");
00084     my $feedback           = $r->param("feedback");
00085     my $courseID           = $r->urlpath->arg("courseID");
00086     
00087     my ($user, $set, $problem);
00088     $user = $db->getUser($userName) # checked
00089         if defined $userName and $userName ne "";
00090     if (defined $user) {
00091         $set = $db->getMergedSet($userName, $setName) # checked
00092             if defined $setName and $setName ne "";
00093         $problem = $db->getMergedProblem($userName, $setName, $problemNumber) # checked
00094             if defined $set and defined $problemNumber && $problemNumber ne "";
00095     } else {
00096         $set = $db->getGlobalSet($setName) # checked
00097             if defined $setName and $setName ne "";
00098         $problem = $db->getGlobalProblem($setName, $problemNumber) # checked
00099             if defined $set and defined $problemNumber && $problemNumber ne "";
00100     }
00101     
00102     # generate context URLs
00103     my $emailableURL;
00104     my $returnURL;
00105     if ($user) {
00106         my $modulePath;
00107         my @args;
00108         if ($set) {
00109             if ($problem) {
00110                 $modulePath = $r->urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Problem", $r,
00111                     courseID => $r->urlpath->arg("courseID"),
00112                     setID => $set->set_id,
00113                     problemID => $problem->problem_id,
00114                 );
00115                 @args = qw/displayMode showOldAnswers showCorrectAnswers showHints showSolutions/;
00116             } else {
00117                 $modulePath = $r->urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::ProblemSet", $r,
00118                     courseID => $r->urlpath->arg("courseID"),
00119                     setID => $set->set_id,
00120                 );
00121                 @args = ();
00122             }
00123         } else {
00124             $modulePath = $r->urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::ProblemSets", $r,
00125                 courseID => $r->urlpath->arg("courseID"),
00126             );
00127             @args = ();
00128         }
00129         $emailableURL = $self->systemLink($modulePath,
00130             authen => 0,
00131             params => [ "effectiveUser", @args ],
00132             use_abs_url => 1,
00133         );
00134         $returnURL = $self->systemLink($modulePath,
00135             authen => 1,
00136             params => [ @args ],
00137         );
00138     } else {
00139         $emailableURL = "(not available)";
00140         $returnURL = "";
00141     }
00142     my $homeModulePath = $r->urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Home", $r);
00143     my $systemURL = $self->systemLink($homeModulePath, authen=>0, use_abs_url=>1);
00144     
00145     unless ($authz->hasPermissions($userName, "submit_feedback")) {
00146         $self->feedbackNotAllowed($returnURL);
00147         return "";
00148     }
00149     
00150     # determine the recipients of the email
00151     my @recipients = $self->getFeedbackRecipients($user);
00152     
00153     unless (@recipients) {
00154         $self->noRecipientsAvailable($returnURL);
00155         return "";
00156     }
00157     
00158     if (defined $r->param("sendFeedback")) {
00159         # get verbosity level
00160         my $verbosity = $ce->{mail}->{feedbackVerbosity};
00161         
00162         # determine the sender of the email
00163         my $sender;
00164         if ($user) {
00165             if ($user->email_address) {
00166                 $sender = $user->rfc822_mailbox;
00167             } else {
00168                 if ($user->full_name) {
00169                     $sender = $user->full_name . " <$from>"
00170                 } else {
00171                     $sender = $from;
00172                 }
00173             }
00174         } else {
00175             $sender = $from;
00176         }
00177         
00178         # sanity checks
00179         unless ($sender) {
00180             $self->feedbackForm($user, $returnURL,
00181                 "No Sender specified.");
00182             return "";
00183         }
00184         unless ($feedback) {
00185             $self->feedbackForm($user, $returnURL,
00186                 "Message was blank.");
00187             return "";
00188         }
00189         
00190         my %subject_map = (
00191             'c' => $courseID,
00192             'u' => $user    ? $user->user_id       : undef,
00193             's' => $set     ? $set->set_id         : undef,
00194             'p' => $problem ? $problem->problem_id : undef,
00195             'x' => $user    ? $user->section       : undef,
00196             'r' => $user    ? $user->recitation    : undef,
00197             '%' => '%',
00198         );
00199         my $chars = join("", keys %subject_map);
00200         my $subject = $ce->{mail}{feedbackSubjectFormat}
00201             || "WeBWorK question from %c: %u set %s/prob %p"; # default if not entered
00202         $subject =~ s/%([$chars])/defined $subject_map{$1} ? $subject_map{$1} : ""/eg;
00203         
00204         # get info about remote user (stolen from &WeBWorK::Authen::write_log_entry)
00205         my ($remote_host, $remote_port);
00206         if (MP2) {
00207             $remote_host = $r->connection->remote_addr->ip_get || "UNKNOWN";
00208             $remote_port = $r->connection->remote_addr->port || "UNKNOWN";
00209         } else {
00210             ($remote_port, $remote_host) = unpack_sockaddr_in($r->connection->remote_addr);
00211             $remote_host = defined $remote_host ? inet_ntoa($remote_host) : "UNKNOWN";
00212             $remote_port = "UNKNOWN" unless defined $remote_port;
00213         }
00214         #my $user_agent = $r->headers_in("User-Agent");
00215         
00216         my $headers = "X-Remote-Host: $remote_host\n";
00217         $headers .= "X-WeBWorK-Module: $module\n" if defined $module;
00218         $headers .= "X-WeBWorK-Course: $courseID\n" if defined $courseID;
00219         if ($user) {
00220             $headers .= "X-WeBWorK-User: ".$user->user_id."\n";
00221             $headers .= "X-WeBWorK-Section: ".$user->section."\n";
00222             $headers .= "X-WeBWorK-Recitation: ".$user->recitation."\n";
00223         }
00224         $headers .= "X-WeBWorK-Set: ".$set->set_id."\n" if $set;
00225         $headers .= "X-WeBWorK-Problem: ".$problem->problem_id."\n" if $problem;
00226         
00227         # bring up a mailer
00228         my $mailer = Mail::Sender->new({
00229             from => $ce->{mail}{smtpSender},
00230             fake_from => $sender,
00231             to => join(",", @recipients),
00232             smtp    => $ce->{mail}->{smtpServer},
00233             subject => $subject,
00234             headers => $headers,
00235         });
00236         unless (ref $mailer) {
00237             $self->feedbackForm($user, $returnURL,
00238                 "Failed to create a mailer: $Mail::Sender::Error");
00239             return "";
00240         }
00241         unless (ref $mailer->Open()) {
00242             $self->feedbackForm($user, $returnURL,
00243                 "Failed to open the mailer: $Mail::Sender::Error");
00244             return "";
00245         }
00246         my $MAIL = $mailer->GetHandle();
00247         
00248         # print message
00249         print $MAIL
00250             wrap("", "", "This  message was automatically generated by the WeBWorK",
00251                 "system at $systemURL, in response to a request from $remote_host:$remote_port."
00252             ), "\n\n";
00253         
00254         print $MAIL "Click this link to see the page from which the user sent feedback:\n",
00255             "$emailableURL\n\n";
00256         
00257         if ($feedback) {
00258             print $MAIL
00259                 "***** The feedback message: *****\n\n",
00260                 wrap("", "", $feedback), "\n\n";
00261         }
00262         if ($problem and $verbosity >= 1) {
00263             print $MAIL
00264                 "***** Data about the problem processor: *****\n\n",
00265 
00266                 "Display Mode:         $displayMode\n",
00267                 "Show Old Answers:     " . ($showOldAnswers ? "yes" : "no") . "\n",
00268                 "Show Correct Answers: " . ($showCorrectAnswers ? "yes" : "no") . "\n",
00269                 "Show Hints:           " . ($showHints ? "yes" : "no") . "\n",
00270                 "Show Solutions:       " . ($showSolutions ? "yes" : "no") . "\n\n",
00271         }
00272         if ($user and $verbosity >= 1) {
00273             print $MAIL
00274                 "***** Data about the user: *****\n\n",
00275                 #$user->toString(), "\n\n";
00276                 $self->format_user($user), "\n";
00277         }
00278         if ($problem and $verbosity >= 1) {
00279             print $MAIL
00280                 "***** Data about the problem: *****\n\n",
00281                 #$problem->toString(), "\n\n";
00282                 $self->format_userproblem($problem), "\n";
00283         }
00284         if ($set and $verbosity >= 1) {
00285             print $MAIL
00286                 "***** Data about the homework set: *****\n\n",
00287                 #$set->toString(), "\n\n";
00288                 $self->format_userset($set), "\n";
00289         }
00290         if ($ce and $verbosity >= 2) {
00291             print $MAIL
00292                 "***** Data about the environment: *****\n\n",
00293                 Dumper($ce), "\n\n";
00294         }
00295         
00296         # Close returns the mailer object on success, a negative value on failure,
00297         # zero if mailer was not opened.
00298         my $result = $mailer->Close;
00299         
00300         if (ref $result) {
00301             # print confirmation
00302             print CGI::p("Your message was sent successfully.");
00303             print CGI::p(CGI::a({-href => $returnURL}, "Return to your work"));
00304             print CGI::pre(wrap("", "", $feedback));
00305         } else {
00306             $self->feedbackForm($user, $returnURL,
00307                 "Failed to send message ($result): $Mail::Sender::Error");
00308         }
00309     } else {
00310         # just print the feedback form, with no message
00311         $self->feedbackForm($user, $returnURL, "");
00312     }
00313     
00314     return "";
00315 }
00316 
00317 sub feedbackNotAllowed {
00318     my ($self, $returnURL) = @_;
00319     
00320     print CGI::p("You are not allowed to send e-mail.");
00321     print CGI::p(CGI::a({-href=>$returnURL}, "Cancel E-Mail")) if $returnURL;
00322 }
00323 
00324 sub noRecipientsAvailable {
00325     my ($self, $returnURL) = @_;
00326     
00327     print CGI::p("No e-mail recipients are listed for this course.");
00328     print CGI::p(CGI::a({-href=>$returnURL}, "Cancel E-Mail")) if $returnURL;
00329 }
00330 sub title {
00331     return "E-mail Instructor";
00332 }
00333 sub feedbackForm {
00334     my ($self, $user, $returnURL, $message) = @_;
00335     my $r = $self->r;
00336     
00337     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
00338     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
00339     print $self->hidden_fields(qw(
00340         module set problem displayMode showOldAnswers showCorrectAnswers
00341         showHints showSolutions
00342     ));
00343     print CGI::p(CGI::b("From:"), " ",
00344         ($user && $user->email_address
00345             ? CGI::tt($user->email_address)
00346             : CGI::textfield("from", "", 40))
00347     );
00348     print CGI::p("Use this form to report to your professor a
00349         problem with the WeBWorK system or an error in a problem
00350         you are attempting. Along with your message, additional
00351         information about the state of the system will be
00352         included.");
00353     print CGI::p(CGI::i($message)) if $message;
00354     print CGI::p(
00355         CGI::b("E-mail:"), CGI::br(),
00356         CGI::textarea("feedback", "", 20, 80),
00357     );
00358     print CGI::submit("sendFeedback", "Send E-mail");
00359     print CGI::end_form();
00360     print CGI::p(CGI::a({-href=>$returnURL}, "Cancel E-mail")) if $returnURL;
00361 }
00362 
00363 sub getFeedbackRecipients {
00364     my ($self, $user) = @_;
00365     my $ce = $self->r->ce;
00366     my $db = $self->r->db;
00367     my $authz = $self->r->authz;
00368     
00369     my @recipients;
00370     
00371     # send to all users with permission to receive_feedback and an email address
00372     # DBFIXME iterator?
00373     foreach my $rcptName ($db->listUsers()) {
00374         if ($authz->hasPermissions($rcptName, "receive_feedback")) {
00375             my $rcpt = $db->getUser($rcptName); # checked
00376             next if $ce->{feedback_by_section} and defined $user
00377                 and defined $rcpt->section and defined $user->section
00378                 and $rcpt->section ne $user->section;
00379             if ($rcpt and $rcpt->email_address) {
00380                 push @recipients, $rcpt->rfc822_mailbox;
00381             }
00382         }
00383     }
00384     
00385     if (defined $ce->{mail}->{feedbackRecipients}) {
00386         push @recipients, @{$ce->{mail}->{feedbackRecipients}};
00387     }
00388     
00389     return @recipients;
00390 }
00391 
00392 sub format_user {
00393     my ($self, $User) = @_;
00394     my $ce = $self->r->ce;
00395     
00396     my $result = "User ID:    " . $User->user_id . "\n";
00397     $result .= "Name:       " . $User->full_name . "\n";
00398     $result .= "Email:      " . $User->email_address . "\n";
00399     $result .= "Student ID: " . $User->student_id . "\n";
00400     
00401     my $status_name = $ce->status_abbrev_to_name($User->status);
00402     my $status_string = defined $status_name
00403         ? "$status_name ('" . $User->status . "')"
00404         : $User->status . " (unknown status abbreviation)";
00405     $result .= "Status:     $status_string\n";
00406     
00407     $result .= "Section:    " . $User->section . "\n";
00408     $result .= "Recitation: " . $User->recitation . "\n";
00409     $result .= "Comment:    " . $User->comment . "\n";
00410     
00411     return $result;
00412 }
00413 
00414 sub format_userset {
00415     my ($self, $Set) = @_;
00416     my $ce = $self->r->ce;
00417     
00418     my $result = "Set ID:                    " . $Set->set_id . "\n";
00419     $result .= "Set header file:           " . $Set->set_header . "\n";
00420     $result .= "Hardcopy header file:      " . $Set->hardcopy_header . "\n";
00421     
00422     my $tz = $ce->{siteDefaults}{timezone};
00423     $result .= "Open date:                 " . $self->formatDateTime($Set->open_date, $tz). "\n";
00424     $result .= "Due date:                  " . $self->formatDateTime($Set->due_date, $tz). "\n";
00425     $result .= "Answer date:               " . $self->formatDateTime($Set->answer_date, $tz) . "\n";
00426     $result .= "Visible:                   " . ($Set->visible ? "yes" : "no") . "\n";
00427     $result .= "Assignment type:           " . $Set->assignment_type . "\n";
00428     if ($Set->assignment_type =~ /gateway/) {
00429         $result .= "Attempts per version:      " . $Set->assignment_type . "\n";
00430         $result .= "Time interval:             " . $Set->time_interval . "\n";
00431         $result .= "Versions per interval:     " . $Set->versions_per_interval . "\n";
00432         $result .= "Version time limit:        " . $Set->version_time_limit . "\n";
00433         $result .= "Version creation time:     " . $self->formatDateTime($Set->version_creation_time, $tz) . "\n";
00434         $result .= "Problem randorder:         " . $Set->problem_randorder . "\n";
00435         $result .= "Version last attempt time: " . $Set->version_last_attempt_time . "\n";
00436     }
00437     
00438     return $result;
00439 }
00440 
00441 sub format_userproblem {
00442     my ($self, $Problem) = @_;
00443     my $ce = $self->r->ce;
00444     
00445     my $result = "Problem ID:                   " . $Problem->problem_id . "\n";
00446     $result .= "Source file:                  " . $Problem->source_file . "\n";
00447     $result .= "Value:                        " . $Problem->value . "\n";
00448     $result .= "Max attempts                  " . ($Problem->max_attempts == -1 ? "unlimited" : $Problem->max_attempts) . "\n";
00449     $result .= "Random seed:                  " . $Problem->problem_seed . "\n";
00450     $result .= "Status:                       " . $Problem->status . "\n";
00451     $result .= "Attempted:                    " . ($Problem->attempted ? "yes" : "no") . "\n";
00452     
00453     my %last_answer = decodeAnswers($Problem->last_answer);
00454     if (%last_answer) {
00455         $result .= "Last answer:\n";
00456         foreach my $key (sort keys %last_answer) {
00457             $result .= "\t$key: $last_answer{$key}\n";
00458         }
00459     } else {
00460         $result .= "Last answer:                  none\n";
00461     }
00462     
00463     $result .= "Number of correct attempts:   " . $Problem->num_correct . "\n";
00464     $result .= "Number of incorrect attempts: " . $Problem->num_incorrect . "\n";
00465     
00466     return $result;
00467 }
